Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Fifty-two percent of 170 respondents said they need more information about what will happen to asylum.

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: At least 4,335 children were separated from their parents due to this policy.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: children who were separated from their parents due to the 'zero-tolerance' policy

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: More than 2.8 million people were expelled due to the reinterpretation of Title 42.
